pr_title: HBASE-24261: Initial version of ASF infra integration configuration

timeline.message:
HBASE-24261: Initial version of ASF infra integration configuration

This is an initial version of the yaml config for ASF infra
integration. We might have some hiccups in the beginning but we
can iteratively improve until the old (desired) setup is back
in place.

We will have to do separate commits for other repositories like
hbase-site etc, for now this is for the main hbase source code
repo.

timeline.bodyText: let's turn off projects while we're here until we can have a discussion on dev@ about using it?
timeline.author: busbey
timeline.diffHunk:

+github:
+  description: "Apache HBase"
+  homepage: https://hbase.apache.org/
+  labels:
+    - database
+    - java
+    - hbase
+  features:
+    wiki: false
+    issues: false
